channel.title: Playing problem
channel.description:
Dear moparcrafters,
i get this text on my client when i want to play [code] Bad video card drivers! -----------------------
Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode. This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.
--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7fe0271 -------- Generated 26/06/11 19:42
Minecraft: Minecraft Beta 1.3_01 OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1 Java: 1.6.0_23, Sun Microsystems Inc. VM: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Sun Microsystems Inc. LWJGL: 2.4.2 [failed to get system properties (java.lang.NullPointerException)]
org.lwjgl.LWJGLException: Pixel format not accelerated at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.nChoosePixelFormat(Native Method) at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsPeerInfo.choosePixelFormat(WindowsPeerInfo.java:52) at org.lwjgl.opengl.WindowsDisplay.createWindow(WindowsDisplay.java:185) at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.createWindow(Display.java:311) at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:856) at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:784) at org.lwjgl.opengl.Display.create(Display.java:765) at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.a(SourceFile:260) at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:632) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) --- END ERROR REPORT 4b30b18e ----------
[/code]
Can somebody help me?

item.title: Playing problem
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

if ur video card doesnt support open gl u wont be able to run it.

Read full topic

item.title: Playing problem
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:10, topic:401034"][quote author=Fenotiq link=topic=498091.msg3647920#msg3647920 date=1309525383]
Hey guys, i have a playing problem too.
If i play about 10 ~20 minutes.
Suddenly, on the minecraft top left corner it says Unlicensed copy.
Than my minecraft just shuts down… Why is that happening?
[/quote]

Are you using the cracked client?[/quote]
yes i am.

Read full topic

item.title: Playing problem
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“Fenotiq, post:8, topic:401034”]Hey guys, i have a playing problem too.
If i play about 10 ~20 minutes.
Suddenly, on the minecraft top left corner it says Unlicensed copy.
Than my minecraft just shuts down… Why is that happening?[/quote]

Are you using the cracked client?

Read full topic

item.title: Playing problem
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

It happened to me too, but thats because I disabled my internet so it wouldn’t update (Adventure Craft is still on 1.6.6 >.>)

Read full topic

item.title: Playing problem
item.dc:creator: @Fenotiq Fenotiq
item.description:
@Fenotiq wrote:

Hey guys, i have a playing problem too.
If i play about 10 ~20 minutes.
Suddenly, on the minecraft top left corner it says Unlicensed copy.
Than my minecraft just shuts down… Why is that happening?

item.title: Playing problem
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote="`SJ_, post:6, topic:401034"][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=498091.msg3642593#msg3642593 date=1309124486]

Update your video card drivers.

type dxdiag in run prompt and then click display tab and search for video card on the internet and make sure it corresponds with your OS like 32bit or 64bit, you know?

Just a note, and if you don’t care about the risks, you can find a modded driver. Although very risky to install.
[/quote]

^ Wouldn’t recommend.[/quote]
I wouldn’t recommend it either unless you know what your doing lol. It took me 3 tries (backup of wndows had to be restored each time) before I finally got he modded driver working on my old Dell.

Read full topic

item.title: Playing problem
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:5, topic:401034”][quote author=`SJ_ link=topic=498091.msg3642504#msg3642504 date=1309117588]
Update your video card drivers.

type dxdiag in run prompt and then click display tab and search for video card on the internet and make sure it corresponds with your OS like 32bit or 64bit, you know?
[/quote]
Just a note, and if you don’t care about the risks, you can find a modded driver. Although very risky to install.[/quote]

^ Wouldn’t recommend.

item.title: Playing problem
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

Dear moparcrafters,

i get this text on my client when i want to play

      Bad video card drivers!      
      -----------------------      

Minecraft was unable to start because it failed to find an accelerated OpenGL mode.
This can usually be fixed by updating the video card drivers.



--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT 7fe0271 --------

OS: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
